mapper.sql: GOODS_ID, GOODS_NAME, TITLE, SELLPOINT, UNIT_PRICE, PURCHASE_QUANTITY, BARCODE, IMAGE_URL, CATEGORY, STORE, DETAIL, DISCOUNT, STATUS, CREATED, UPDATED, COLLECTION_ID, SELLER_ID
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from goods
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into goods (GOODS_ID, GOODS_NAME, TITLE, SELLPOINT, UNIT_PRICE, PURCHASE_QUANTITY, BARCODE, IMAGE_URL, CATEGORY, STORE, DETAIL, DISCOUNT, STATUS, CREATED, UPDATED, COLLECTION_ID, SELLER_ID) values (#{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellpoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{purchaseQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{barcode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{store,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{collectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sellerId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
